casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William DERBECK. No. 203P05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of May 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal of a Writ of Certiorari to the N.C. Supreme Court":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
